original_text: While I was speaking and praying, confessing my sin and the sin of my people Israel, and presenting my plea before the Lord my God for the holy hill of my God,
korean_text: 내가 이같이 말하여 기도하며 내 죄와 내 백성 이스라엘의 죄를 자복하고 내 하나님의 거룩한 산을 위하여 내 하나님 여호와 앞에 간구할 때

sentences.original_text: While I was speaking and praying,
and the sin of my people Israel,
and presenting my plea before the Lord my God
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 하나님 여호와 앞에 간구를 드리며,

sentences.original_text: for the holy hill of my God,
